changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `outgouing_company` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `updated` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `tm_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `name` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `state` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, `is_locked` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date_start` date NOT NULL, `date_finish` date NOT NULL, `time_start` time NOT NULL, `time_finish` time NOT NULL, `is_pause_on_day_off` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_restart_on_day_start` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `answer_timeout` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '60', `call_tries` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `pause_after_conversation` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `pause_after_try` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '10', `action` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `action_value` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `last_conversation` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `concurrent_calls_limit` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `call_duration_limit` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `calls` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `asteriskId` varchar(32) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `userId` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `state` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `tm_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `tm_rbt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `tm_bridged` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `tm_done` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `caller` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `called` varchar(16) CHARACTER SET latin1 NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `rbt_duration` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `duration` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `fn_mixmonitor` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `hangup_cause` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `hangup_code` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `q850_code` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `q850_reason` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `sip_call_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `qos` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `dialstatus` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `called` (`called`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `outgouing_company_callerid` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `outgouing_company_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `callerid` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `order` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `outgouing_company_contacts` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `updated` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `outgouing_company_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `phone` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `state` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tries` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `last_call` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `dial_result` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`outgouing_company_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `outgouing_company_contacts_calls` ( `call_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `contact_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`call_id`), UNIQUE KEY `contact_id` (`contact_id`,`company_id`,`call_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 ROW_FORMAT=FIXED;

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `outgouing_company_contacts_calls` ( `call_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `contact_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `company_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`call_id`), UNIQUE KEY `contact_id` (`contact_id`,`company_id`,`call_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=cp1251 ROW_FORMAT=FIXED;

changeSet.author: kae
kae

changeSet.author: kae
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `outgoing_campaign_dial_result_setting` ( `campaign_id` INT(11) NOT NULL , `result` TINYINT(2) NOT NULL , `pause` INT NULL , `pause_time` INT NULL , `stop` TINYINT(1) NULL , `postpone_for` INT NULL , `postpone_to` DATETIME NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`campaign_id`, `result`) , INDEX `fk_outgoing_campaign_dial_result_setting_id_idx` (`campaign_id` ASC));

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `checklist_questions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `checklist_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `question` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE `checklist_answers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `question_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `date` date NOT NULL, `answered` datetime NOT NULL, `answer` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `user_question_date` (`user_id`,`question_id`,`date`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.author: rp

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `scripts` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `deleted` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `scripts_stages` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `script_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `parent_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `show_name` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `show_prevnext` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deleted` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `sid_idx` (`script_id`), CONSTRAINT `sid` FOREIGN KEY (`script_id`) REFERENCES `scripts` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `scripts_stages_elements` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `script_stage_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `label` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `text` text, `url` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `form` text, `form_to` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `action` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `action_script` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `action_block` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `action_text` text, `action_transfer` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `sid_idx` (`script_stage_id`), CONSTRAINT `sid2` FOREIGN KEY (`script_stage_id`) REFERENCES `scripts_stages` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `cdr` CHANGE COLUMN `user_id` `user_id` INT(10) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `calldate` `calldate` DATETIME NULL, CHANGE COLUMN `name` `name` VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `clid` `clid` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `src` `src` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `dst` `dst` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `dst_bill` `dst_bill` VARCHAR(64) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `dcontext` `dcontext` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `channel` `channel` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `dstchannel` `dstchannel` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `lastapp` `lastapp` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `lastdata` `lastdata` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `duration` `duration` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `billsec` `billsec` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `ratesec` `ratesec` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `disposition` `disposition` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `amaflags` `amaflags` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `accountcode` `accountcode` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `uniqueid` `uniqueid` VARCHAR(64) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `userfield` `userfield` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `rate` `rate` DECIMAL(8,5) NULL DEFAULT '0.00000' , CHANGE COLUMN `cost` `cost` DECIMAL(8,5) NULL DEFAULT '0.00000' , CHANGE COLUMN `bstep` `bstep` VARCHAR(16) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `currency` `currency` VARCHAR(3) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `t_name` `t_name` VARCHAR(64) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `t_accountcode` `t_accountcode` VARCHAR(64) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `department` `department` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '0' ; ALTER TABLE `queue_cdr` CHANGE COLUMN `calldate` `calldate` DATETIME NULL, CHANGE COLUMN `uniqid` `uniqid` VARCHAR(32) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `queue` `queue` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `agentid` `agentid` VARCHAR(16) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `agentname` `agentname` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `agentdev` `agentdev` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `agentcalls` `agentcalls` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `holdtime` `holdtime` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `talktime` `talktime` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `ringtime` `ringtime` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `position` `position` TINYINT(2) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `origposition` `origposition` TINYINT(2) NULL DEFAULT '0' , CHANGE COLUMN `callerid` `callerid` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `src` `src` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `channel` `channel` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `dstchannel` `dstchannel` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `disposition` `disposition` VARCHAR(32) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `context` `context` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `exitcontext` `exitcontext` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `exten` `exten` VARCHAR(32) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `accountcode` `accountcode` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `userfield` `userfield` VARCHAR(128) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `appl` `appl` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `data` `data` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `reason` `reason` VARCHAR(32) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `transferexten` `transferexten` VARCHAR(32) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `transfercontext` `transfercontext` VARCHAR(80) NULL DEFAULT '' , CHANGE COLUMN `server` `server` VARCHAR(80) NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `outgoing` `outgoing` TINYINT(1) NULL ;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `acl_user_phone` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `phone` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `model` INT NOT NULL, `mac` VARCHAR(17) NULL, `user_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `login` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `password` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `rules` INT(10) NULL, `default_phone` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC), INDEX `user_id` (`user_id` ASC), CONSTRAINT `fk_id` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `acl_user` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci;

changeSet.author: andrey.mrthod
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `acl_user_phone` DROP FOREIGN KEY `fk_id`; ALTER TABLE `acl_user_phone` CHANGE COLUMN `model` `model` INT(11) NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `user_id` `user_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `login` `login` VARCHAR(45) NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `password` `password` VARCHAR(45) NULL ; ALTER TABLE `acl_user_phone` ADD CONSTRAINT `fk_id` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `acl_user` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

changeSet.author: andrey.mrthod
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `acl_group_phone` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `code` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `pattern` INT(11) NULL, `rules` INT(11) NULL, `outgoing_phone` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)); ALTER TABLE `acl_group_phone` CHANGE COLUMN `pattern` `pattern` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `rules` `rules` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL ; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `acl_group_has_phone` ( `group_id` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `phone_id` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`group_id`, `phone_id`)); ALTER TABLE `acl_group_has_phone` CHANGE COLUMN `group_id` `group_id` INT(11) NOT NULL , CHANGE COLUMN `phone_id` `phone_id` INT(11) NOT NULL , ADD UNIQUE INDEX `phone_id_UNIQUE` (`phone_id` ASC);

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE queue_agent ADD phone VARCHAR(45) NULL, ADD `static` TINYINT(1) NULL; ALTER TABLE `queue_agent` CHANGE COLUMN `phone` `phone` VARCHAR(45) NULL AFTER `acl_user_id`, CHANGE COLUMN `acl_user_id` `acl_user_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL , DROP PRIMARY KEY; ALTER TABLE `queue` ENGINE = InnoDB; ALTER TABLE `queue_agent` ENGINE = InnoDB, CHANGE COLUMN `acl_user_id` `acl_user_id` INT(10) UNSIGNED NULL ; ALTER TABLE `queue_agent` ADD CONSTRAINT `qid` FOREIGN KEY (`queue_id`) REFERENCES `queue` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, ADD CONSTRAINT `uid` FOREIGN KEY (`acl_user_id`) REFERENCES `acl_user` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION;

changeSet.author: rp
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `aliases` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `number` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `type` ENUM("phone","queue","user") NULL, `phone` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `queues_id` INT NULL, `users_id` INT NULL, INDEX `number_idx` (`number` ASC), PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin;
